abstract: Associates the array of geometry descriptors that comprise this primitive acceleration structure.
overview:
## Discussion

If you enable keyframe motion by setting property [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4PrimitiveAccelerationStructureDescriptor/motionKeyframeCount] to a value greater than `1`, then all geometry descriptors this array references need to be motion geometry descriptors and have a number of primitive buffers equals to [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4PrimitiveAccelerationStructureDescriptor/motionKeyframeCount].

Example of motion geometry descriptors include: [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4AccelerationStructureMotionTriangleGeometryDescriptor], [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4AccelerationStructureMotionBoundingBoxGeometryDescriptor], [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4AccelerationStructureMotionCurveGeometryDescriptor].

# geometryDescriptors

**Instance Property**

Associates the array of geometry descriptors that comprise this primitive acceleration structure.

## Declaration

```swift
var geometryDescriptors: [MTL4AccelerationStructureGeometryDescriptor]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you enable keyframe motion by setting property [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4PrimitiveAccelerationStructureDescriptor/motionKeyframeCount] to a value greater than `1`, then all geometry descriptors this array references need to be motion geometry descriptors and have a number of primitive buffers equals to [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4PrimitiveAccelerationStructureDescriptor/motionKeyframeCount].

Example of motion geometry descriptors include: [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4AccelerationStructureMotionTriangleGeometryDescriptor], [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4AccelerationStructureMotionBoundingBoxGeometryDescriptor], [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4AccelerationStructureMotionCurveGeometryDescriptor].
title: geometryDescriptors
